trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> starts running.
trans-unit.target: 充当是活动的一组容器时执行<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>开始运行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateInitializationActivity acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateInitializationActivity 充当<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>到它所包含的所有活动。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the StateInitializationActivity.

If a StateInitializationActivity exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the StateInitializationActivity is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存在 StateInitializationActivity <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>，StateInitializationActivity 是获取的第一个活动时执行<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>开始执行。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In some ways the StateInitializationActivity is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: 在某些方面 StateInitializationActivity 就像是`OnEnterState`处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
The StateInitializationActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateInitializationActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity 是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，这意味着 StateInitializationActivity 可以包含其他活动。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity 不能包含任何活动实现<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>接口，包括所有<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>活动和<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>活动。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: A StateInitializationActivity is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: 在中执行 StateInitializationActivity <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>，使非阻止方式<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>准备好接收事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity 可以包含<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>活动，因此它可以模拟状态机，而不会收到任何事件发生转换从一个状态到另一个状态。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: 这种意义上状态机表现得像顺序工作流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref>类使用活动的名称。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
